_header: Of all flowers fairest fall one
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A song in praise of the Virgin Mary — thirteen 8-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Off alle floures feirest fall onAnd þat is Marie Moder
                    fre…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In heuene of þe to haue a sihtLadi to þe my mone I
                    mene
